formula: (1/48) (n-1)n(n+1)(n+4)(n^2+7n+14), n>1.If we define f(n,i,a)=sum(binomial(n,k)*stirling1(n-k,i)*product(-a-j,j=0..k-1),k=0..n-i), then a(n-1) = -f(n,n-3,2), for n>=3. [From _Milan Janjic_, Dec 20 2008]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
